name: 許益瑞
objective: 本課程將從介紹基礎統計學出發，利用一些實證的資料，尤以跟工程或物裡化學相關的數據，來學習統計的分析。此外，也將簡單介紹一些輔助學習的軟體。
schedule:
Week 1.　　Review Fundamental Mathematics
Week 2.　　Introduction
Week 3.　　Summarizing Data: Listing and Grouping
Week 4.　　Summarizing Data: Measures of Location
Week 5.　　Summarizing Data: Measures of Variation
Week 6.　　Possibilities and Probabilities
Week 7.　　Some Rules of Probability
Week 8.　　Expectations and Decisions
Week 9.　　Probability Distributions
Week 10.　　The Normal Distribution
Week 11.　　Sampling and Sampling Distributions
Week 12.　　Problems of Estimation
Week 13.　　Tests of Hypotheses: Means
Week 14.　　Tests of Hypotheses: Standard Deviations
Week 15.　　Tests of Hypotheses Based on Count Data
Week 16.　　Analysis of Variance
Week 17.　　Regression
Week 18.　　Correlation
Week 19.　　Nonparametric Tests
materials:
Textbook: John E. Freund, Modern Elementary Statistics, 11th ed. 2004.
References:
1.　　D. C. Montgomery and G. C. Runger, Applied Statistics and Probability for Engineers,. 3rd. ed.
2.　　R. Larson and E. Farber, Elementary Statistics: Picturing the World, 4th ed.
3.　　李德治，童惠玲, 應用統計學, 博碩文化
